hero.headline: Automate workforce operations inside the tools your team already uses.
hero.subheadline: StaffiX runs attendance, break tracking, leave requests, and progress reporting in Slack, Microsoft Teams, LINE, and more—then gives admins a clean dashboard with filters and export-ready records.
hero.trustText: Setup in minutes • No behavior change • US & Japan-ready

problem.title: The problems with traditional workforce management
problem.solution: StaffiX solves this by working in the tools people already use.

howItWorks.title: How it Works
howItWorks.step1: Install StaffiX to your chat tool(s)
howItWorks.step3: Employees use simple messages (checkin, break, back, checkout, updates, leave)

attendance.title: Attendance & Shifts
attendance.desc: Check-in/out, late detection vs shift window, accurate time formatting (timezone-safe)

breaks.title: Break Tracking
breaks.desc: Multiple sessions/day, daily totals, view sessions detail

updates.title: Daily Updates + Reminders
updates.desc: updates / today's report / end of day report, reminder after 4 hours automatically, skips if already submitted

leave.title: Leave Management
leave.desc: Single-day future leave scheduled deduction, multi-day range excludes weekends/holidays, paid/unpaid handling, cancellation + audit trail

integrations.title: Works inside your existing tools.
integrations.desc: StaffiX brings the same workflow across channels—so your team doesn't learn a new system.

faq.newApp: Do employees need a new app?
faq.newAppAnswer: No, StaffiX works inside your existing chat tools.
faq.platformsAnswer: Yes, and more platforms are available on request.

security.title: Security & Trust
items: Audit trail for leave balance changes

cta.title: Stop managing HR ops in spreadsheets.
